name: ABBER DEMON returns
description: Evil makes cursed noises, drops to a REALLY deep voice, or a REALLY high voice

name:
evil is aware
( :aware: :neuroAware: )
description: Evil says something that causes chat to spam the :aware: (Aware) or :neuroAware: (neuroAware) emote

name: evil rizzes chat
description: Evil says something in an attempt to rizz chat

name: neuro rizzes chat
description: Neuro says something in an attempt to rizz chat

name: a sea shanty is sung
description: Evil and Neuro sing a sea shanty together

name: character break
description: either Evil or Neuro drop out of pirate speak and talk normally for a single sentence

name: evil makes chat walk the plank
description: Evil demands that chat walk the plank

name: rum mentioned
description: Evil or Neuro mention rum entirely on their own

name: evil calls someone a landlubber
description: Evil calls someone from chat (or a collab partner) a landlubber

name: pre-scripted event occurs
description: an event which Vedal has scripted to happen beforehand occurs

name: evil and neuro confess love
description: Evil and Neuro confess their love for each other, don't confuse with flirting

name: neuro makes vedal walk the plank
description: Neuro specifically calls for Vedal to walk the plank.

name: twin sync
description: Evil and Neuro fail to take turns and, as a result, say each others sentences at the same time

name: laughs at "poop deck"
description: either Evil or Neuro laugh at the concept of a "poop deck", or the words themselves

name: evil shouts something unhinged
description: Evil shouts something unhinged, for example "KILL THE TURTLE AND PUT HIM IN THE RUM!"

name: evil comes up with new name
description: Evil comes up with a new name for herself

name: fakes ai problems
description: either Evil or Neuro fake AI problems; the problem message is incorrect or it's only said once before going back to normal

name: borderline TOS violation
description: either Evil or Neuro say something which constitutes a Terms Of Service violation, or very close to being one

name: identity crisis
description: Evil thinks she's Neuro or Neuro thinks she's Evil

name: evil speaks a different language
description: Evil speaks an actual different language for an entire sentence

name: essaying
description: either Evil or Neuro talk long enough for chat to start spamming :essaying: (essaying)

name: they get sidetracked
description: Evil and Neuro get sidetracked from pirate related stuff and talk entirely off-topic

name: neuro mentions eating cats
description: Neuro says she'll eat a cat, or wonders what a cat tastes like

name: remember captain vedal
description: either Evil or Neuro remember Captain Vedal (they MUST refer to him as "Captain Vedal" else it doesn't count)

name: mentions non-vedal streamer
description: either Evil or Neuro mention another streamer who is not Vedal

name: evil changes accents
description: Evil's accent changes randomly

name: says "arr"
description: either Evil or Neuro say "arr"

name: fight
description: Neuro and Evil have a fight / argument

name: booty mentioned
description: either Neuro or Evil mention booty

name: says "the seven seas"
description: either Neuro or Evil mention the seven seas

name: flirt
description: Neuro and Evil flirt with each other

name: says "erf"
description: either Neuro or Evil say "erf"

name: chat spams :evilCry:
description: chat spams :evilCry: (evilCry) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :wokege: :neuroWake:
description: chat spams :wokege: (Wokege) or :neuroWake: (neuroWake) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :schizo:
description: chat spams :schizo: (SCHIZO) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :based:
description: chat spams :based: (BASED) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :corpa:
description: chat spams :corpa: (Corpa) at any point during the stream

name: chat spams :meow:
description: chat spams :meow: (meow) at any point during the stream
